content: make 3 single_crochet in next * single_crochet 6 repeat instructions between stars once single_crochet 1 make an invisible join change colors turn so right side is facing join in 1st of the 3 on either peak chain 1 make 3 single_crochet in next the center single_crochet single_crochet 6 sc3tog single_crochet 6 make 3 single_crochet in next single_crochet 6 sc3tog single_crochet 5 join to beg with slip_stitch repeat row 2 repeat row 3 using half_double_crochet for the entire row instead of single_crochet measure the height of the whole thing now it should measure about 4 25 inches if it meas- ures less add more row to make it the correct height or if you re making this cozy for a gadget taller than an ipod keep adding row until you have reached about 25 inches taller than your gadget s height sew the top square onto the body by whip stitching the center 17 sts on the bottom edge of the top square to the center 17 sts on what will be the back side of the body see pic below sew through the blo of both edges sew a button onto the front side centered on the 2nd row of the body add a row of sl sts across the front of the top row on the body this will prevent it from getting stretched out back invisible join instructions cut the yarn and pull the end all the way through the center of the last st made using a yarn needle weave the end under both loops of the 2nd st to the left this would be the first single_crochet if the turning chain counts as a st then back down through the center of the last st abbreviations beg=beginning blo=back loops only chain=chain double_crochet=double_crochet frm=from half_double_crochet=half_double_crochet hk=hook single_crochet=single crochet skip=skip slip_stitch=slip_stitch space=space st/sts=stitch/stitches
